member.name: M:DeviceInfo.DeviceInformation.GetInstance
member.summary: The shared function GetInstance will implement a check for the instantiation of class DeviceWLan to make sure that the class has only one instance

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.DeviceInformation.GetDeviceType
member.summary: Returns the device model number

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.DeviceInformation.GetSerialNumber
member.summary: Returns the device serial number

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.DeviceInformation.GetMacAddress
member.summary: Returns the MAC Address of the network adapter
member.remarks: 000000000000 wil be returned if unable to get the deivce MAC address

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.DeviceInformation.GetIPAddress
member.summary: Returns the device IP address
member.returns: IP address in the format xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx
member.remarks: 127.000.000.1 will be returned if IP address is not found

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.DeviceInformation.SetDeviceDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: To set device time to same as controller time.
member.returns: True - If successfully set the device time. False - If error in setting the device time.

member.summary: Function to check if an instance of the application is already running

member.summary: Release the mutext at application exit.

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.ConfigFileManager.GetParam(System.String)
member.summary: Get the value for the passed parameter from the configlist

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.ConnectionMgr.GetInstance
member.summary: The shared function GetInstance will implement a check for the instantiation of class ConnectionManager to make sure that the class has only one instance

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.ConnectionMgr.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Function to try and establish a connection with the Controller/server

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.ConnectionMgr.Disconnect
member.summary: Function to disconnect connection with the Controller/server

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.ConnectionMgr.Connected
member.summary: Returns true if the socket is connected to the server. The property "Socket.Connected" does not always indicate if the socket is currently connected, this polls the socket to determine the latest connection state.

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.ConnectionMgr.Send(System.String)
member.summary: Function to send message to the Controller/server over the socket. It prefixes the message with control character FFh followed by a 4-digit total message length (includes FFh + 4-digits in total).
member.param: String containing message to send to server

member.name: M:DeviceInfo.ConnectionMgr.Receive(System.String@)
member.summary: Function to receive message from the Controller/server over the socket.
